product_name: Lonely Planet Guides The Pacific Northwest's Best Trips
long_description: Hit the open road with a few ideas from Lonely Plant Guides The Pacific Northwest's Best Trips. It offers 33 road trips throughout Oregon, Washington and British Columbia.
